website_summaries.verdict: Roomy, well-insulated meal prep bag made of resistant materials and available in a variety of colors.
pros: The deep pockets on this bag can easily fit water or Blender bottles
A well-designed layout provides optimal organization and enough room for food for an entire day
Comes with 3 convenient and well-sized food containers
cons: Zipper tends to get stuck, and the strap could be better quality

customer_reviews.title: Edit one year later
customer_reviews.text: So it’s been 14 months and now I’m disappointed. After 14 months of like use, maybe three times a week, zipper gave out on me. When the zipper gives out, the way that I can’t fix. So, now I have to buy another $70 bags. Luckily for me, I have a Jack’s bag that’s about three years old and is still going strong. My Jack’s bag was $20, I can afford to buy this every year without any issues. I wish there was some sort of repairs and six pack could make, but they said they don’t. So unfortunately, I’m down to two stars.
customer_reviews.author: V lobos

customer_reviews.title: This is a great pack for work or short trips
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pack for work or short trips. It comes with 3 small containers which are really nice, but... very small. I can fit about 3oz of rice and 3-4oz of chicken in each one so they are smaller portions. I’d say not good for a bulking plan. PROS: Inexpensive Durable cold pack included 3 durable containers included Compact CONS: Small containers Not a whole lot of storage for other things. But it is the compact version. This is a great product but for myself, I probably should have purchased a larger version.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me. We ordered a larger one for the family.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great! It is the perfect size for my lunch, a couple small snacks and 2 shaker bottles. I mostly use this bag to bring my lunch and protein shakes to the 5-6 hour practices I coach. With the included gel freezer packs, it keeps my food, water and shakes cold all day, or is also good for just keeping the heat out for room temperature items. It is very sturdy and easy to clean. You can wipe it clean, or even spray it out with a hose in case you spill something in there! For multiple meals or trips with the family we have also purchased 6 Pack Fitness' larger cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: More professional looking than the standard bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this new bag. I use it as a lunch box for work and holds my breakfast and lunch with snacks easily. It also comes with 4 containers one of which is a divided container for any supplements you may need. Side pockets also stretch and hold my water bottle and coffee nicely without poking out of the bag giving it a more professional look than carrying the traditional lunchbox. The gel packs could use improve however, they last about 6 hours which I guess would be good for a normal shift however I work 12 hr days. Other than that I find the bag very streamlined and convenient.
customer_reviews.author: RyanTop Contributor: Smart Home

customer_reviews.title: but it is probably my favorite purchase as far as I can remember
customer_reviews.text: I wish there were more stars to give this bag. I was very skeptical at first ordering a lunch bag that was so expensive, but it is probably my favorite purchase as far as I can remember. I use it five days a week when going to work and it has plenty of space. It looks very nice and is a quality product. I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Howarth

customer_reviews.title: love!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! its is large enough to fit 2 to 3 meals with extra space in the top compartment plus side pockets! very easy to carry around with the strap or handles, I really like this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of the velcro
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge 6 pack fan and this is my 3rd lunch bag from them. Unfortunately this one had some stitching issues where the velcro was placed. I’m also not exactly sure why they got rid of some of the snap inserts and decided to add all the velcro. Haven’t even used it yet and the velcro is coming off.
customer_reviews.author: JCW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a normal day of lunch and snacks.
customer_reviews.text: The bag is perfect for me, a normal guy with a job that doesn't guarantee me a place to store food for lunch and snacks. I had the 300 and it was just waaaaaay too big for my needs. This will hold 1.5 chicken breasts, salad, some fruit and a snack with no problem. A small bottle of water, utensils and condiments if you want them. Also, customer service was great.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Leon Jones

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend This Bag!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, exactly what I was expecting and excellent product quality! I wanted a bag that I could easily bring one prepped meal (lunch) to work in and and the bag does exactly that. The extra room in the side pockets for blender bottles is very functional and the upper storage pocket has a nutrition case that you can easily sort pills and such into while over room for other snacks. Overall I'd highly recommend the product and am happy I spent a little extra on this bad versus some of the cheaper alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Avgeres

customer_reviews.title: Ripped
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy! I’ve had this for a little over a month. It has ripped on the side. I don’t even use it that often for it to rip. Super sad. It was great until it ripped.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Dooling

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Not heavy and doesn’t draw aatention like the bigger sizes. Very practical !
customer_reviews.author: MQ

customer_reviews.title: The product has not held up at all. I ...
customer_reviews.text: The product has not held up at all. I had one of these for over a year and used it every day without any rips or tears. This particular one I ordered from this distributor, the inside lining has multiple tears and the seams on the outside are coming apart.
customer_reviews.author: Sportsmom

customer_reviews.title: I received one of these bags as a christmas gift ...
customer_reviews.text: I received one of these bags as a christmas gift (6 Pack Mini Innovator) and was very impressed (not purchased from Amazon, local retailer). I jumped on to Amazon to purchase one for my daughter. The bag recived was not the one pictured in the advertisement. The one received must be new old stock. The materials used are not the same quality as the one I recived nor are the logos on the bag the same as pictured in the advertisement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfied customer - ZERO STARS/DO NOT ORDER
customer_reviews.text: This is not the bag i ordered. The bag in the picture and description is completely different from what I received. That’s false advertisement and very misleading, I am not happy about this. The second bad part is you can’t return it.
customer_reviews.author: Charles D.

customer_reviews.title: Control what you eat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday gift for a friend and she was very excited to receive it! I've got one myself and just love it! Very sturdy construction and it makes it so easy to control what you eat. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: HMI Products

customer_reviews.title: Makes adulting easier
customer_reviews.text: Carries three smallish tupperware containers nicely in main compartment. Heavy glass containers are no problem. Fits full sized nalgene or shaker bottles in end pockets. No more spills, no more forgotten lunches, no excuses. Kickass, high quality, where-have-you-been-all-my-life, yes I can adult, product.
customer_reviews.author: camossung

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: It's a lunch bag. Works great, holds everything I need and keeps it cold all day. Would recommend. And I did have a bag fall apart and it was replaced hassle free. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: cars.winter.gunz

customer_reviews.title: Easy access to the three main Tupperware as well as ...
customer_reviews.text: The husband loves this lunch box bag. Easy access to the three main Tupperware as well as the small snack Tupperware on the top. Ice packs are strategically placed to ensure long lasting on the go refrigeration. Perfect size for needing 3 meals plus snacks on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M Guiry

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! It's the perfect size! I like using the 2 cup Pyrex glass snap ware which fits perfect in this bag unlike what I saw on previous reviews. I also have the SixPackBags Renee tote which I love when I'm not going to be gone too long or when I don't have too much to carry as the compartment on top is limited on space. The innovator mini is great when I'm gone all day at school and need to carry tons of books I can just carry this in addition to my book bag without feeling too weighed down.
customer_reviews.author: Brianne Stringham

customer_reviews.title: it is perfect for carrying 3-4 meals
customer_reviews.text: I'm thrilled with this lunchbox, it is perfect for carrying 3-4 meals. I pack it up with the ice packs and meals around 7 AM and pull my last meal at the office around 4:30...it's still ice cold. When I get home, the ice packs are also still very cold. I am impressed at how well made it is and how much I can get in it. It is a smart design that can be changed to fit your needs and container size.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Mulkey

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality material
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality material and or construction. Really bummed because I love the idea of this bag and all the storage but I literally used the bag twice and the stitching began to fray at the seem of the shoulder strap. I mean it sat in the passenger seat of my car... Sad thing is, it looks like a common issue after looking at some of the other reviews. Get it together 6 Pack Fitness!
customer_reviews.author: S. W.

customer_reviews.title: zippers come off track and customer service doesn't respond
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size. The zippers tend to break. I called their company and went through the steps to get a warranty fix. They never got back to me..
customer_reviews.author: Chaffed

customer_reviews.title: Bad A**
customer_reviews.text: THis bag was a big win my food has stayed cold uo to 7 hours and is really nice I love the black bag. 5 star for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Concepts of this lunch bag is amazing, however quality is extremely poor despite conscious attempts ...
customer_reviews.text: I received the product defected. The back strap was stitched upside down. Concepts of this lunch bag is amazing, however quality is extremely poor despite conscious attempts not to wear out straps and stitching prematurely. I have had this bag for 2 1/2 weeks and use it 4 days out of the week, traveling to and from the school and work parking lots. Not sure if I would have experienced this if I had purchased it in its full retail value. I got worse than what I paid for. It’s a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: This is a terrific lunch pale
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific lunch pale. Been using it for several months and only complaint is depending how you insert the ice pack, this xan cause the zipper to hang up.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Warren

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected but perfect
customer_reviews.text: I’m happy I bought a version that was smaller than expected. Helps to reduce the size of my meals. I only have one criticism, it’s missing an ice pack for the very top. Other than that it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Strap broke in first 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Strap broke within two weeks. Disappointed with this purchase. Bag wasn't heavy and it just came out the seams. Not a good price for a bag to break so quick.
customer_reviews.author: tiffanyrican213

customer_reviews.title: that girl is FIT!
customer_reviews.text: Makes clean eating and meal prep that much easier. Bought one for myself and my brother and this little bag carries a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Reine

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Well I used it once until now. I use it for work. Looks nice. Enough space for my juice. The food container is small. I expected to be bigger than this. Overall I am happy with the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Mohamed Ali

customer_reviews.title: Bought a fitmark bag instead and love it.
customer_reviews.text: Not for me. The meal container were too small. I wasn't really a fan of the 6 pack in the front to begin with. Bought a fitmark bag instead and love it.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Keeps it cold all day
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. They work great. It holds my food all day and keeps it cool. The containers are a perfect size for lunch and snacks! I got lucky and found this one for $20! Much less than most times.
customer_reviews.author: adbuford

customer_reviews.title: Excellent meal-prep bag.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I love this meal-prep bag. It is large enough to fit all my meals/snacks, but not nearly as large as some other bags i've seen. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: High hopes!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bag with multiple compartments for various items. My only hope is the handles and zippers hold up long enough to justify the price. Seller was great with quick processing and shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly A Sims

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but smaller than the original by a long shot
customer_reviews.text: I have been a user of six pack bags since 2009, so after wearing out the old one, I decided to upgrade. This 3 tray unit is a lot smaller than expected. I am usually gone all day, and this one holds only a snack. Better pictures and demensions are needed
customer_reviews.author: Gimmeabrekplez

customer_reviews.title: Husband is a happy camper with this pack.
customer_reviews.text: Husband has been using it for two weeks straight and loves it. Fits his meals, snacks, supplements, shaker bottle. He's a happy camper. Will most likely get additional meal containers from them soon to make the full week prep a reality, instead of cleaning and packing the containers each night.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced, waste of space.
customer_reviews.text: Yeah the zippers still work, but this thing stays about as cold as my oven at 300, it’s absolutely useless. A $12 Walmart cooler and a frozen bag of water do the job the exact same.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag and tons of room even for the mini
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag and has a ton of space, I bought the 3 meal mini and it's awesome. Wish it came with more gel packs
customer_reviews.author: Reed C

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: it's worked great. It would be 5 stars if the cold packs stayed cold longer
customer_reviews.author: Hassan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my boyfriend. He works long 12 hour shifts but doesn't have room to take a huge cooler. This one is perfect size. Keeps his food cold and surprisingly holds a lot of food.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Canett

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I like this meals bag its very helpful i used every day for work gym i hope to get another color soon thank you
customer_reviews.author: Mr Ahmad AL-Saeed

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily.. Perfect for meal prepping. Holds three meals a day and two drinks. Bag is not bulky and looks nice. I've had many ask where I got it.
customer_reviews.author: NY2MD

customer_reviews.title: very useful for small meals
customer_reviews.text: I bring this to school everyday, very useful for small meals. Only problem is the zippers always jam even when the bag is empty.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Great Product all around!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived Same Day as promised. Perfect condition and works great Work 12 to 14 hours and the ice packs will still be frozen in the middle. Nice having such an awesome product that comes thru on every feature/desire you could want or need. Very satisfied and ordering another for my wife since she liked it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Jamazon  Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: I do not normally do reviews but this bag is great. I work in LE and work 12 hour shifts. I pack my lunch around 5pm throw in the 2 ice packs the bag came with plus 2 extra. 6 hours later my food is still very cold and ice packs are still good to go. Lots of extra room and the storage system is removable allowing lager meal containers. I highly recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: matthew

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The bag is smaller than I expected, since other reviews said it was larger. The quality of the material is cheap. The zippers get hung up easily and the boning structure is warped. I was disappointed with the overall quality of the bag for the price.
customer_reviews.author: offtoseejb

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. I had the classic 6 pack bag but it was too large for me. This size is perfect. Catch it on sale. Shipping was fast and product arrived in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: ElizabethH

customer_reviews.title: Ripped bag after 1 week
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this bag. However, I’ve used it for exactly ONE WEEK and it already ripped from one of the side zippers. It’s way too pricey to be ripping this early on.
customer_reviews.author: Jovanna

customer_reviews.title: The best one I've ever owner. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best lunch bag I've ever owned. I've received a lot of compliments on it. The trays it comes with are very good quality and even use them when I'm not using the bag. The containers and microwave and dishwasher safe so clean up is very easy. The way the bags compartments are structured makes it so easy to grab stuff out of without digging. It also comes with 2 ice packs which keeps the food cold for hours. I can fit both my water and my coffee cup and it's so convenient.
customer_reviews.author: cas

customer_reviews.title: but for what the bag costs I would expect it to be better quality. The middle compartment zipper gets stuck because ...
customer_reviews.text: No problems with the shipper, but for what the bag costs I would expect it to be better quality. The middle compartment zipper gets stuck because the fabric has a tear in it, it came that way out of the box. I have other 6 pack goods that are nice, this one not so much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice design but...
customer_reviews.text: The design is great and I would given it 5* if not for the fact that I have had the bag for 2 weeks and the shoulder strap has almost ripped completely off just from wearing it around my shoulder a few times. Quality and stitching is not there for this product. I paid a premium price and expected to get premium quality. I don't know if this one was just defective or what not but I'm trying to get a new one sent to me but the only option amazon gives is for me to return the item at my own expense for a refund...
customer_reviews.author: BeSharp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. It's easier for me to carry to and from work.
customer_reviews.author: Seven

customer_reviews.title: love my lunch bag
customer_reviews.text: love my lunch bag!! i use it when i leave the house on short errands. this brand is just fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Viao23

customer_reviews.title: Fitness and fashionable
customer_reviews.text: Staying fit in style just became easier with this bag. It can also fit other types of compact foodware. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the size its very useful and I can get ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the size its very useful and I can get three to four meals and keep my meals in nice temp with the ice gel!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Lunch Box I have every owned!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Packs a good days lunch and drinks and then soem.
customer_reviews.author: LOLJ5FAM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Carries everything and it is not too bulky and looks clean and tactical.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag
customer_reviews.text: After having used the normal sized innovator for some time, I switched to the mini just because the normal size was bulky and the shoulder strap was useless. The mini is a perfect size. I can still fit two large bottles in it as well as three meal containers, and there is still room for snacks and utensils. Overall excellent bag.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Miller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this food bag. It keeps everything in its place!
customer_reviews.author: Raiza Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a Christmas present to take to college. LOVE IT! I can plan and pack my meals and protein shakes for the day. Size is very manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Initially I was very happy with this bad. But now after a few months it sucks. The straps totally broke off. DO NOT purchase.
customer_reviews.author: miapoohnag

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Lunch Bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag to replace a slightly larger bag that was flimsy and had no organization. This bag is perfect!!! it has just enough room for a days worth of food while being at work all day. I have found that the containers also help in reducing the use of plastic baggies. The side mesh pockets fit my water bottle and coffee mug perfectly. I do however use two of the small square blue ice packs in addition to what was provided with the bag to help keep things colder longer. They fit perfectly on the side of the plastic container area and in the inside pockets. So far, super happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Good Shop

customer_reviews.title: 6 pack fitness makes awesome bags, i ended up exchanging this for the ...
customer_reviews.text: 6 pack fitness makes awesome bags, i ended up exchanging this for the next bigger size but its great quality. i totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan H

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!!
customer_reviews.text: It has been great so far. It does everything as advertised. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Smiley

customer_reviews.title: It keeps me lunch nice and cold
customer_reviews.text: I take this bag with me to work everyday. It keeps me lunch nice and cold!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Mosher

customer_reviews.title: Omg I love it sooo cute & literal
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag but when they said mini, they were being literal, I didn't expect it to be so small however I made a few adjustments inside the bag that are removable like the top part that holds the supplements and the holder for the meals i took out to fit larger containers.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: It's just ok, but could be better.
customer_reviews.text: It's ok could be better. For the price I think it's not worth it. The back ice pack is to big for the slot and as it melts the outside of the back becomes soaked.
customer_reviews.author: MALIK T WHITE

customer_reviews.title: I feel i throughout
customer_reviews.text: I request an Big Issolated bag but I get the Mini version! It’s way different that the one is posted on the account!!!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Material is NOT good... Rips easily.
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed with the quality of the material. I purchased this bag in February 2017 and it's now April 2017 and the sides are ripping. I was really hoping for more out of this bag, as I researched before purchasing. I will now have to give eBags a try... (not thrilled).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Keeps me on tack while I am ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Keeps me on tack while I am at school full time and work Full time. Perfect size and one of my favorite colors...ALL Black!

customer_reviews.title: Poor stitching...
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my sister and the strap on the back broke....poor stitching.... Can this bag be replaced?

customer_reviews.title: The bag arrived dirty and with a broken zipper
customer_reviews.text: The bag arrived dirty and with a broken zipper. Very upsetting. The bag itself looks like it would be great if it wasn’t damaged. Hopefully I can edit my review once I receive a replacement bag.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag arrived on time undamaged
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag arrived on time undamaged. This really helps out getting meals in at work. Great bag pleanty of room for what I need ex. Three meals, shaker, vitamins.Have to give a four because one of the two ice packs started leaking three weeks in
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag but ice packs leaked
customer_reviews.text: Great little bag BUT I've had it now for over a month and the ice packs it comes with are defective. They leaked all over my food and table and I had to throw it away. So now I have nothing to keep it cool. Sucks

customer_reviews.title: Compact.... well constructed. Replaced my ...
customer_reviews.text: Compact....well constructed. Replaced my larger version with this...met all expectations.

customer_reviews.title: We purchased this product in December of 2016 and here ...

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My nutritional life is now in order,love this product, well worth the money

customer_reviews.title: love how it holds so many meals in such a ...
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it, love how it holds so many meals in such a small container.

customer_reviews.title: AN INVESTMENT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I consider this bag a GREAT investment to my new lifestyle of healthy eating. I take it with me everywhere I go, so I won't have any excuses. It's like my 2nd purse!!
customer_reviews.author: Raven R. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this mini bag on June 12 and it's coming apart already.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Agnew

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great product! I love my 6 pack bag
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great product! I love my 6 pack bag, very convenient and makes meal prepping easier with the tupperwares
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Briones

customer_reviews.title: GREAT but not for the price it is
customer_reviews.text: Its a very convenient lunch bag but not for the price it is. Just saying, you can get a lunch bag just as good at T.J Max
customer_reviews.author: stephanie campos

customer_reviews.title: I am terribly disappointed with the original construction of this bag
customer_reviews.text: I received the bag on time and it was very well packaged. However... The strap that holds the D-ring where the shoulder strap attaches is already fraying and coming apart. And this after only one use. I am terribly disappointed with the original construction of this bag, it works well for me. Since I have industrial sewing machines and repair camping equipment, I will do the repairs myself and reinforce the other side. The functionality of the bag is amazing, the construction of it is not.
customer_reviews.author: Vichyssoise

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: Love this item, but the zipper broke after 2 weeks and one of my ice bags broke and leaked. :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but it looks nice and feels very durable
customer_reviews.text: I haven't actually used the bag yet, but it looks nice and feels very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy L

customer_reviews.title: Great for a day of meals.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bag. As a heavy lifter, it provides enough space for lunch and dinner, but I use the 500 series for full day meal preps. I would totally take this on the plane, but haven't tried yet. I do wish the side pockets for water bottles and shaker bottles were more insulated, as I like to store cans of sparkling water in them.
customer_reviews.author: CHAN

customer_reviews.title: I really like this lunch bag
customer_reviews.text: I really like this lunch bag, it works fine, looks just like the picture. The only down size to it was that the food containers are smaller than most and its really hard to find other containers that will fit, or even buy extra containers from the same company. Its heavier than I expected, and the strap is so uncofrtable that i usually have to hold it by the hanger. One of the ICE packs was broken, so I ended up buys more ice packs.
customer_reviews.author: celina marcano

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect to pack my meals for work
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect to pack my meals for work. The only thing I wish they could change is the top container. It's meant to be for supplements but I don't use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_User

customer_reviews.title: NEED A ANSWER ASAP !
customer_reviews.text: I'm missing my shakers ! When I was about to buy it, the picture shows 2 shakers and also missing the container the one goes on top of the bag and one more thing I start packing my staff for tomorrow work and on the side of the bag where the strap goes start unsewing..........! CHEAP MATERIAL TOTALLY SUCKS FOR EXPENSIVE LUNCH BAG .
customer_reviews.author: Chechel R

customer_reviews.title: Great compact lunch bag.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag. The included ice bags keep my relatively cold and the side pockets easily fit my shaker bottles. The food containers are a little small but, that is why I bought the product for the small form factor. 6oz of ground meat will almost max out a container, then again you have 3 more containers that you can put more food in so shouldn't be a problem. I love this bag though, it has officially replaced all of my old lunch bags.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence L. Karchner Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great product for meal prep
customer_reviews.text: Great product for staying organized for meal prep and daily eating while at work! Have purchased two of them and will order them again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Fritz

product_meta.title: 6 Pack Fitness Mini Innovator 3 Meal Management System
feature_bullets: Patent-pending adjustable core carries and keeps a day's worth of meals independently accessible and fresh.
Nothing Mini about this. Everything you need to travel fit.
Includes: 6 Pack Expert Innovator Mini Bag, 3-20 oz. Snap Lid Containers, 1 Large and 1 Medium Gel pack, and 1 Sport Nutrtion Container
Fully Insulated Interior Keeps Meals Cold for 8+ Hours * Tons of Storage Options
Exterior Construction: 1680D Polyester and Neoprene * Interior Construction: Cool Tech Lining * External Dimension: 14"L x 6"W x 11"H
